Reference

Use with facet_*()

coord_panel_ranges()

Zoom in or out for specific facet panels

Use in scale_*()

label_expfn()

Label exponential format

label_mixfonts()

Label mixed-fonts HTML strings

label_repl2blank()

Label character vector with blanks at a certain interval

Return values

expfn()

Convert numbers as expressions of exponential format

kurai_ja()

Japanese scale units by 'Man-shin-hou'

makeXlColAlphabet()

Make Microsoft Excel's alphabet column names

mixfonts()

Unify ascii and multibyte fonts into a string

repl2blank()

Replace string elements to blank at a certain interval

va_resc()

Values and second Axis RESCaler
